alert.note: Alert for Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wallace County through 1115 PM MDT... At 1013 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sharon Springs, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall. Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to localized flooding. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sharon Springs around 1025 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
